list_definition.definition: a liquid got from petroleum, used as fuel for motor cars etc; gas or gasoline American

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ll stop at the next garage and buy more petrol

list_ex_of_english: The main occupations are : drivers, tractor drivers, petrol station workers, irrigation workers (men and women), weeders (men and women), gardeners and loaders.
